Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Quote from: jhairrobernas on December 05, 2017, 07:00:08 PM When we bought your tokens on PRE ICO - we had another terms...  Thank you both for your comments and concerns. What you are saying is understandable and reflects the opinion of some.  Please keep in mind the following: The initial PRE-ICO rules stated that with 1 ETH, participants, would receive 200 Trade Tokens. The hard cap had to be revised based on market and member concerns as well as due to the sharp increase in Ethereum's price (up 175% in less than a month's time - $300 on 09/11 up to $522 on 29/11), making it easier for everyone to participate as well as the project more realistic. Trade Token pricing was thus reduced by a factor of 5. So, this was reflected in the revised price of 1 ETH for 1000 Trade Tokens with everyone receiving 1000 TIO instead of the original 200. Moreover, all PRE-ICO participants had been given an additional 150 TIO as a bonus for their early participation and trust, raising the final actual PRE-ICO price to 1ETH for 1150 TIO. Essentially, PRE-ICO participants have received for 1 ETH, 250 more Trade Tokens than early ICO participants (first week's ICO pricing stands at 1 ETH = 900 TIO). That's 28% cheaper. After having proceeded with this fair adjustment, we had received a lot of praise by most PRE-ICO participants for which we are thankful.   General Information: If an organisation isn't quick to react and adopt it is doomed to fail. Rest assured that trade.io will not keep changing it's game-plan if there is no valid reason for it. We had to take decisive action due to the many major changes that have happened during the last month. We also had to take notice of our members' comments. Please keep in mind that no one has been left uncompensated and that all of the early contributors received an additional bonus number of tokens as a thank you over and above what was originally agreed. The reaction we've received from industry experts around the world as well as forum members and contributors, the increase in the number of funds flooding in during the last stages of PRE-ICO, the number of inquiries and membership applications we are receiving right now in the days leading to the ICO, as well as the revision seen in regards to the reviews our project is getting all indicate that the changes made were wise and widely accepted.  Once more, thank you for your comments and concerns. Any opinion or advice from dear members is always welcome.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: 27 November 2017, Zug, Switzerland.  trade.io has announced the launch of its partnership with HitBTC Exchange, one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges, exceeding upwards of half a billion in daily volume and operating since 2014.  Having just finished a PRE-ICO period which resulted in well over $10M in funding, trade.io is proud to provide its loyal contributors with this added value partnership, demonstrating the company’s continued intent to cooperate with the highest calibre participants in the blockchain field.  Trade.io will announce shortly when the Trade Token (or TIO, which is how it will be listed on the HitBTC exchange), will start trading. TIO will trade against the counters, Bitcoin (BTC) & Ethereum (ETH).  On the listing, CEO, Jim Preissler commented, “trade.io pledged at a very early stage to Trade Token holders to be listed on a major exchange within 30 days following the ICO. To have the ability to announce a listing on such a respected exchange like HitBTC even before the start of ICO, is very gratifying. We owe all of our success thus far to our amazing trade.io community and I'm happy to be able to provide this news to them.”  HitBTC CPO Paul Clarkson commented, “It’s no secret that HitBTC is extremely selective in the tokens & coins we list; we have strict criteria and require an extensive amount of due diligence prior to extending an offer. trade.io has proven to be a trusted partner and we are pleased to list TIO, and start a long-term relationship.”  Having just completed its wildly successful pre-ICO, trade.io has raised in excess of $11.3M from over 4,000 participants. According to icoscanner.io, trade.io is currently the 5th most successful ICO in terms of Ethereum contributions. The ICO is due to begin on December 5th.  Find out more by visiting trade.io.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you for your interest and question. In regards to question number one, here is the updated information based on the new Trade Token price:   In order to participate in the liquidity pool, clients must commit a minimum of 2,500 Trade Tokens as a membership fee.  A Graduated Plan will be used when it comes to the participants’ daily share of the profit as per the table below (Trade Token participation):    As the table suggests, the higher the amount of the participation is, the higher the percentage share of the profit will be with 25,000 Trade Tokens being the minimum number of Trade Tokens locked for full / maximum profit share (Investing 25,000 Trade Tokens and above carries an additional 10% as a bonus).   Example of Liquidity Pool Participation  To illustrate a sample situation using the graduated plan in the table above, let’s take the following hypothetical situation:  Participant A has locked 2,500 TradeTokens - this means they will be eligible for 10% participation. Participant B has locked 12,500 TradeTokens eligible for 50% participation. Participant C has locked 25,000 TradeTokens eligible for 110% participation.  Now, let’s assume the 3 participants above are the only participants in the liquidity pool and $10,000 was generated in revenue on a hypothetical day:    Participant A accounts for 6.25% of the Trade Tokens found within the liquidity pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 6.25% = 2,500) or a share of $625 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 6.25%). Since they are entitled to only 10% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 10% of $625 or $62.50.  Participant B accounts for 31.25% of the Trade Tokens found within the liquidity pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 31.25% = 12,500) or a share of $3,125 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 31.25%). Since they are entitled to 50% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 50% of $3,125 or $1,562.50.  Participant C accounts for 62.50% of the total number of Trade Tokens found within the pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 62.50% = 25,000) or a share of $6,250 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 62.50%). Since they are entitled to 110% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 110% of $6,250 or $6,875.   In regards to your second question an announcement will be made when necessary. Thank you.

Author: S3cco
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Trade.io Adjusts Market Cap & Trade Token Price Based On The Rise in Ethereum And Demand for Lower Entry Point: https://bitcoingarden.org/trade-io-adjusts-market-cap-trade-token-price-based-rise-ethereum-demand-lower-entry-point/  Trade.io announces that as a result of community response, the company has decided to take steps to enable greater participation in its highly anticipated ICO. This includes adjusting the entry price per Trade Token to a lower price to allow for broader participation and reflect the rise in Ethereum, which is used for purchase. With the soft launch already achieved during the PRE-ICO, the price reduction lowers the upper level of the fund raise to approximately $135 million. The result of this reduction will be net positive for existing and future Trade Token participants as it will provide existing token holders with a greater amount of additional tokens, and will allow new participants the ability to obtain a larger amount of Trade Tokens. Additionally, the start of the ICO has been revised to December 5th, still concluding on the originally planned date of December 15th, 2017...

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: It is wise to be wary and suspicious of any new project really. This is the only way to safeguard yourself and your assets. In regards to our project, it is not just about a software solution. Where did we give that idea? It is a whole trading platform - an unrepresented at that. There is a whole ecosystem with hundreds of people behind it. There are tremendous costs involved to acquire all those licences as well as connections with the global financial industry and a lot of R&D required to proceed with something that was never done before. Plus, it includes a Liquidity Pool where all participants will be bale to deploy funds found within to fund upcoming projects thus boosting global development. Keep seeking the truth and it shall be given to you - a wise man said! Have a great day and thanks for your concern and question.   Quote from: themathiasmiller on November 23, 2017, 11:17:35 PM Quote from: trade.io on November 23, 2017, 02:10:03 PM Quote from: adiksau0414 on November 23, 2017, 01:35:21 PM What is the purpose of the adjustment? And how will this help the Investors?  And to the people involved in liquidity pool?  Thanks for your valid question. The purpose of the adjustment is trust building. There were a lot of comments regarding the fact that our previously suggested hard cap that was in the range of $450-990 million was simply too high and unnecessary. Many of our investors were reluctant to invest just because of the huge risk they perceived in this number. It cost too much for investors to participate in the project and their participation within the project as well as within the Liquidity Pool would be simply to small - percentage-wise - had the original number stayed. Taking into account the fact that Ether now costs 25% more than what it did just before the start of PRE-ICO, we simply had to listen to our members' and investor's comments. This now makes for a more 'personal' trading platform and Liquidity Pool.  Can you explain more on "personal" trading platform? So does this mean that every time investors complain about the way you do things you're just gonna adjust with their liking? And every time your members will suggest something, you're sure to comply to their suggestions? Or does this only relates to the ethereum's price? Like what happened now. Will you eventually lower the minimum amount of tokens to join the liquidity pool if people will demand it to be lower? Or will you just lower it if ever eth's price will increase more?  Again thanks for your question. We have proceeded with only two adjustments during PRE-ICO (this is a very early stage with our project still in its infancy): The price of the token and Liquidity Pool participation requirements based on the market reaction.  If an organisation isn't quick to react and adopt it is doomed to fail. Rest assured that trade.io will not keep changing it's game-plan if there is no valid reason for it. The reaction we've received from industry experts around the world as well as forum members, the increase in the number of funds flooding in as well as the revision seen in regards to the reviews our project is getting all indicate that the changes made were wise and widely accepted.

Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thanks for your valid question. The purpose of the adjustment is trust building. There were a lot of comments regarding the fact that our previously suggested hard cap that was in the range of $450-990 million was simply too high and unnecessary. Many of our investors were reluctant to invest just because of the huge risk they perceived in this number. It cost too much for investors to participate in the project and their participation within the project as well as within the Liquidity Pool would be simply to small - percentage-wise - had the original number stayed. Taking into account the fact that Ether now costs 25% more than what it did just before the start of PRE-ICO, we simply had to listen to our members' and investor's comments. This now makes for a more 'personal' trading platform and Liquidity Pool.

Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Beta testing of the trade.io platform is expected to hit sometime early 2018. Expect further news then, as well as tutorials and further explanation as there will be a constant, 24/7 support for traders.   Quote from: jameyap32 on November 23, 2017, 04:20:19 AM So does this mean that whenever the price of ethereum increases, trade.io decreases the market cap and when the demand for lower entry increases, you guys increase it as well. In total, are you guys in favor of the users?  Thank you for your concern - it is a valid one.  The decision made to lower the market cap was based on the feedback we received from industry experts as well as early members of trade.io - you guys who have invested in trade.io. This change was made only once and it won't happen again. In regards to the fluctuation in Ethereum's price (and all crypto assets for that matter), it is understandable that this is just the way it is and it's impossible to proceed with solid predictions as well as expect that every time there is a change we will be re-adjusting our market cap or the price of our token.   GREAT NEWS - We have reached and surpassed the $9 million mark!

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thanks for your question and concern. The timeline has always been clearly listed within our website and whitepaper. Our aim is to distribute the Trade Tokens within a month after the end of the ICO the LATEST. There is a great chance that many or even all participants will receive their tokens earlier but just to be on the safe side we have provided everyone with a time frame of a month.   Quote from: arsenia on November 21, 2017, 05:09:51 AM Quote from: trade.io on November 20, 2017, 02:46:16 PM Quote from: jituroych on November 20, 2017, 02:30:31 PM Hi new here when is the ico gonna hit. trade.io platfrom looks very interesting to not look into it.  PRE-ICO ends on the 25th of November. ICO will last from the 28th of November till the 15th of December. Thanks for looking into our project - it's much appreciated.     Quote from: tinochan412 on November 19, 2017, 07:18:23 AM For reference, how much has your project raised now?  Please be informed that we have added a counter within our website's home page in regards to the funds raised. Now everyone will be able to monitor the progress made. Click HERE for that. How much would the coins be after ICO? Would it still be the same?  Thanks for your question and consideration. If we have understood your question correctly, once ICO finishes (15/12/2017), Trade Tokens will be distributed (by the 15th of January). All unsold tokens will be burned. A month after that (somewhere along February 2018) Trade Tokens will be listed within major trading platforms where everyone will be able to sell and buy at the market's then current price (prices will fluctuate based on demand and supply) as is the case with Bitcoin for example.   Quote from: creatine413 on November 21, 2017, 06:18:05 AM Quote from: bamb on November 20, 2017, 03:43:13 PM As I understand it, anyone can get in and out  of liquidity pool as they wish, what is the advantages and disadvantages of moving in and out of liquidity pool and how does it affectvthe pool itself? I think this would be the point, whenever someone has a token or is a contributor , they would have shares of their dividends. I'm not quite sure of the disadvantages.  Thank you bamb and thank you creatine413 for helping other forum members out. Not everyone will have the necessary funds at all times to be able to participate in the liquidity pool. There will be days that for some reason trade.io members will prefer to invest their funds elsewhere. Taking this into account we have made it so that everyone will be able to join in and out on a daily basis. Due to the number of participants of the liquidity pool, we don't feel that this will have a great effect on the pool and its performance as there will be always members jumping in and out...   Quote from: laurenB7742 on November 20, 2017, 09:37:46 PM Trade.io is number 5 on the list of ongoing ICOs by the amount of ETH raised so far. This is quite impressive and that's how I found your project. I see that you have many ideas so I am sure you will spend all the money wisely. I see Trade.io as a long term project, so investors don't need to worry about token price. When the online stores start operating and tokens start circulating, the price will only go up. It's interesting that average contribution to this pre-ico is more than 11 ETH which means big players also backed this project.  Thank you very much laurenB7742 for your informed opinion and for sharing this with forum members. That's what being cautious means - having all the facts before proceeding with any kind of investment.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: All liquidity pool participants will be able to join in and leave it on a daily basis - whenever they see fit / have the funds for it. That's the beauty of it! You don't have to join now since the project is still under development. Thank you for your consideration.   Quote from: nguyenchung on November 18, 2017, 04:08:18 PM Anyone help me, Which amount ETH ( at least) to buy Tokens TIO in Pre- ICO ?  Hello there - thank for your question. Lowest investment amount is 0.1 ETH.   Quote from: hadang on November 20, 2017, 07:49:57 AM Quote from: mpet5000 on November 20, 2017, 04:40:12 AM How do I exchange Trade Tokens for fiat? You seem to want to buy token with fiat. During Pre-ICO, the project accepts payments using ETH and fiat, but to ICO the project only accepts ETH so you need to buy it with Pre-ICO. Fiat = usd or local currency, so you can buy tokens by bank transfer.  Thank you mpet5000 for helping out other members and trade.io   Yes, you may buy Trade Tokens using fiat currency until the end of PRE-ICO. Please visit our website by clicking HERE, register and select to pay in fiat. Another advantage during PRE-ICO is the fact that Trade Tokens are cheaper than during ICO.   Quote from: creatine413 on November 20, 2017, 06:06:45 AM Quote from: Bakukang on November 19, 2017, 11:14:09 PM Its good to know that they are paying much of their attention for their consumers and costumers of this platform.And what about their liquidity pool?  I think in their liquidity pool, you have to use the Trade Token to participate in the trade.io shared liquidity pool. Users that are participating will ge their share of dividends which is a good thing for consumers/users  Thank you creatine413 for helping out other members and trade.io    So essentially, trade.io is a next generation trading platform or broker.  In contrast with all of the currently established brokers, trade.io will be sharing 50% of its proceeds with its clients (traders). This 50% will go into what is called a 'liquidity pool'.  trade.io clients (cell them traders, members and so on!) will be able to add their share of the funds they have available for investment within the pool (with the minimum amount being 500 Trade Tokens / trading on our platform does not get them a share in the liquidity pool automatically) should they choose to. This way they will be able to get their share of the proceeds trade.io makes (essentially becoming a shareholder in trade.io).  Now, the pool, containing the assets added within by trade.io and its clients will be able to act as a 'bank' financing / investing in new projects, start-ups or organisations through ICOs or IPOs thus having a share in the proceeds this new project will have, further boosting the pool's value as well all participants' share in the proceeds. Everyone participating in the pool will be able to democratically approve where to invest the money with their voting power being based on their share of the total amount of investments found within the pool.  Please keep in mind that liquidity pool participants will be able to join using other assets as well as as major fiat and crypto assets receiving their share back in the same asset they've invested in, but Trade Token will pay the highest return.  Please see our whitepaper by clicking HERE going through point 4 for more details.  Hope this helps! Thank you.

Author: vopsy
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx

If you check the raised ethereum that time was only $2,400,000 and the rest of them until $7,000,000 is fiat money with only they word as prove.   (really! to an ICO they raised 2 times more FIAT money) 5. They made a major change in regards to the requirements of participation in the liquidity pool, of course who will invest over 15,000$ (5000 TIO to be able to participate), only for a white paper project (very well done the white paper I have to say), so they had to lower the participation in the liquidity pool to 500 TIO, otherwise who will invest?, you just check their ethereum account is not big difference from 4 days ago when they announce their pre-ICO success.  I want, I hope, I wish to be wrong and wish you success, if you'll make it happen it will be a game changer in the trading market.

Author: danmoris
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Vopsy,  Yes, indeed there's definitely something wrong with you.  I’ll preface my message by being transparent and saying I’m indeed a trade.io supporter and have purchased a large amount of Trade Tokens after having deeply studied this project as well as their whole team.  In return, you should probably be transparent too, and admit you’re a troll with obvious ulterior motives.  The problem is you’re not even an informed troll.  Please sit back, grab a coke and smile while I put you in your place, point by point:  1) There are ZERO board members from FX PRIMUS on the board of trade.io.  Zero means none, nada, zilch.  There is one board member, Damian McDowell, who is on the board of Primus Capital Markets UK, which is an FCA regulated entity that is also on the board of trade.io.  Before you correct yourself and try to work this angle, I’m fairly sure no reasonably minded human being will have an issue with an FCA regulated individual being on the board of a financial company.  With that said, I’m sure you’ll try, and wind up making a fool of yourself in the process.  2) Charles Voltron is the CTO and assisting with the blockchain piece of the trade.io project.  On the website and White Paper, the management is listed.  In case you are new to the business world, management usually means you manage people.  So one could assume that Charles manages a team of people that also work on blockchain, couldn’t one?  If this is a tough concept for you to grasp, you should take a break from being a troll, and read up on how this sort of thing works.  3) Yes trade.io released how much it had raised.  How exactly is this different than any other ICO that reports amount raised throughout an ICO?  Please inform the fine people of this message board, Senor Troll.  4) Yes, it appears they raised $2.4M in ETH and the rest appeared in fiat (note I said fiat and not fiat money as that is sort of redundant, kind of like calling a Ferrari a Ferrari Car.)  See #3 for the rest of my answer here.    Obviously your insinuation is that trade.io is fabricating their fund raise…..apart from being a sad troll, any specific reason for this accusation….I’m sure people would love to hear it.    5) Yes, they made a major change to accomodate more participants, not sure what your point is here.  Based on what I observed from their telegram, many people asked about participating in the liquidity pool but didn’t have the money for the 5K Trade Tokens, so the company lowered it.  This is a bad thing?  Lastly, you say you “hope, wish to be wrong and wish success”……no you don’t, you’re a miserable person who more than likely has a sad life.  What irritates me so much about people like you, is that there’s a company here in trade.io that is run by respectable, successful people that is trying to do things the right way on multiple levels…not by a bunch of kids that have never run a business in their lives.  Trolling is a part of the internet and message boards and it goes with the territory…the problem is you’re a bad troll with lame arguments, and above all baseless accusations.    I hope you find peace in your life, and can’t wait to see the success of trade.io to shut trolls like you up once and for all.  P.S. People, just check this guy's profile and posts. For him talking about transparency is unfortunate and ironic at best. He's a newbie with just 7 posts under his belt ALL of which with the specific purpose of slandering our project. Is this a coincidence? Are his motives pure? Draw your conclusions...

Author: danmoris
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Nice try 12trys!!!  It is clear that you are the very same lame person with our dear 'friend' Vopsy 'acting' as his lawyer and defender!  Danmoris has never been a defender for anyone - feel free to go through my posts. I have never commented as harshly on anyone's posts cause everyone is entitled to their honest opinion and has every right to express it if made with good intentions.  This is indeed a serious forum and this is indeed a super-serious ICO. But it seems you wish to turn both into a circus. We forum members can't allow that - especially under Bitcoin and Altcoin threads.  That's why when I see two newbie accounts that have been deliberately created for the sole purpose of attacking without no reason whatsoever a new project with as much background as this, it gets on my nerves. It's dishonesty and manipulation on a grand scale. It's what everyone deeply involved with blockchain technology is trying to fight. You 'sir,' don't belong here. Go back to the establishment - back to the centralized controlled environment from which you came from. Stop harassing and trolling brilliant ideas and initiatives. Stop trying to take our world back into the middle ages.  Enough with you.  You have/had no intention on 'investing', you were called out on your troll attempt (both accounts) with lame points and you were embarrassed. The trade.io community is extremely strong and doesn’t put up with nonsense. Take your crap elsewhere, it doesn’t work here. Period.  P.S. I wish to apologize to trade.io as well as to everyone who's supporting this project for my comments and harshness against these two trolls if I have been out of line and inexcusable. Thank you.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you hadang for stepping in and helping - it's much appreciated.   We would like to add the following:  On top of Forex trading (obviously trade.io will offer the same functionality), trade.io offers the following:  Full transparency thanks to blockchain technology. Everyone trading on our platform will have access to real-world prices thus providing fair trading to all - something that isn't the case with traditional forex. This in itself is a huge advantage over traditional forex trading and a huge reason for someone to use our platform rather than our competitors'.  Additionally, for people that will be able to participate in our liquidity pool (they will need to lock a minimum of 500 (scheme just changed) of their tokens as a participation fee), our platform will offer the unrepresented advantage of sharing 50% of its profit with its traders. Participants will be able to join for short periods of time, even for just 24 hours since the pool will be sharing its proceeds on a daily basis. This is groundbreaking in contrast with traditional investments that require your funds to be locked for a specific period of time sometimes up to a year or even more. The liquidity pool provides freedom never heard of before as well as transparency in regards to its real performance.  Another positive aspect of the liquidity pool is the fact that it will be able to fund upcoming ICOs / IPOs giving the right to its participants to vote which projects will be funded, empowering pioneering projects / technological breakthroughs that would otherwise stay unmaterialized, boosting global advancement.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you for this and never stop asking questions! That's how we learn and we should never stop learning!  So essentially, trade.io is a next generation trading platform or broker.  In contrast with all of the currently established brokers, trade.io will be sharing 50% of its proceeds with its clients (traders). This 50% will go into what is called a 'liquidity pool'.  trade.io clients (cell them traders, members and so on!) will be able to add their share of the funds they have available for investment within the pool (with the minimum amount being 500 Trade Tokens / trading on our platform does not get them a share in the liquidity pool automatically) should they choose to. This way they will be able to get their share of the proceeds trade.io makes (essentially becoming a shareholder in trade.io).  Now, the pool, containing the assets added within by trade.io and its clients will be able to act as a 'bank' financing / investing in new projects, start-ups or organisations through ICOs or IPOs thus having a share in the proceeds this new project will have, further boosting the pool's value as well all participants' share in the proceeds. Everyone participating in the pool will be able to democratically approve where to invest the money with their voting power being based on their share of the total amount of investments found within the pool.  Please see our whitepaper by clicking HERE going through point 4 for more details.  Hope this helps! Thank you. Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: A great thank you to 'vopsy' and '12trys' for their relentless pursuit of the truth. This is what EVERYONE should be doing BEFORE proceeding with investing their hard-earned assets into anything new.   There are literary hundreds of ICOs out there right now that unfortunately are taking advantage of the 'unregulated' current nature of ICOs, creating a bad name for those few legit projects. This is by the way, an area we wish to address with our project. NO ONE should simply follow a hype or the crowd when it comes to investing. EVERYONE should keep asking questions until they receive satisfying answers BEFORE proceeding.  We wish to assure you that our project is legit and that trade.io will not make a run with our investor's money.  Please keep in mind that we are really into the early stages of our project and as is the case with all projects being at their infancy, there are still details being cleared out as we speak. For example: Depending on the amount collected during ICO, the number of adopters that come along, the number of major investors that join our program as well as the number of the technical alliances that trade.io proceeds with, the different the outcome, the final functionality, acceptance, team configuration and board configuration will be. Please keep in mind that this is ALWAYS the case - this is reasonable.  Every successful organisation must be able to swiftly adopt within a constantly changing environment as well as listen to its clients' comments. It is impossible for any given organisation to disclose ALL of the details behind their business to the public.  Despite the above, once trade.io enters the official ICO period, more information and details will be disclosed to everyone's satisfaction. Please stand by for this.  A LOT of detailed information is constantly provided in our Telegram Group in real time. Please feel free to join - YOU HAVE TO JOIN actually! You may find a LOT of information there covering all of your possible questions putting your mind at ease.  And don't forget: NEVER STOP ASKING... Thank you.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: We are really excited to announce a major change in regards to the requirements of participation in the liquidity pool.  The response to our liquidity pool has been overwhelming! However, trade.io's management has decided to revise the minimum number of Trade Tokens required for participation based on the feedback we received from our dear community members and supporters.  Please find the exciting details below in regards to the revision made (comments taken from our updated whitepaper):  In order to participate in the liquidity pool, clients must commit a minimum of 2,500 Trade Tokens as a membership fee.  A Graduated Plan will be used when it comes to the participants’ daily share of the profit as per the table below (Trade Token participation):    As the table suggests, the higher the amount of the participation is, the higher the percentage share of the profit will be with 25,000 Trade Tokens being the minimum number of Trade Tokens locked for full / maximum profit share (Investing 25,000 Trade Tokens and above carries an additional 10% as a bonus).    Example of Liquidity Pool Participation    To illustrate a sample situation using the graduated plan in the table above, let’s take the following hypothetical situation:  Participant A has locked 2,500 TradeTokens - this means they will be eligible for 10% participation. Participant B has locked 12,500 TradeTokens eligible for 50% participation. Participant C has locked 25,000 TradeTokens eligible for 110% participation.  Now, let’s assume the 3 participants above are the only participants in the liquidity pool and $10,000 was generated in revenue on a hypothetical day:  Participant A: 2,500 Trade Tokens (10%) Participant B: 12,500 Trade Tokens (50%) Participant C: 25,000 Trade Tokens (110%) Trade Token Total in the Liquidity Pool: 40,000  Participant A accounts for 6.25% of the Trade Tokens found within the liquidity pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 6.25% = 2,500) or a share of $625 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 6.25%). Since they are entitled to only 10% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 10% of $625 or $62.50.  Participant B accounts for 31.25% of the Trade Tokens found within the liquidity pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 31.25% = 12,500) or a share of $3,125 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 31.25%). Since they are entitled to 50% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 50% of $3,125 or $1,562.50.  Participant C accounts for 62.50% of the total number of Trade Tokens found within the pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 62.50% = 25,000) or a share of $6,250 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 62.50%). Since they are entitled to 110% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 110% of $6,250 or $6,875.

Author: johnsm79
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Very logical questions!  1) As for the Ether Wallet, trade.io accepts not only ETHER but especially for the PRE-ICO it also accepts Fiat payments with bank wire transfer! Thus a large amount of funds came from deposits.  2) The response to our liquidity pool has been overwhelming. However, the feedback by some in our community is how they can participate if they don’t have the minimum 5,000 TradeTokens. Well, management has taken this feedback into consideration, and is happy to announce a revised liquidity pool schedule that allows those with as few as 500 TradeTokens the ability to participate using a graduated schedule.  So basically to my understanding is that many people wanted to participate in the trade.io project but wanted to do so if there was a chance to participate in the Liquidity Pool. Because there's many people that wanted this, management found a fair way to make this happen.  The table found above, illustrates how a participant with 5000 Trade Tokens, gets 110% participation, so that people who already have participated with trade.io get an added benefit.  At the end of the day, the bigger the pool, the better for me and you and everyone. Is a win-win situation here.  Full article from Management Blog: https://medium.com/@trade.io/new-participation-schedule-participate-in-the-liquidity-pool-from-500-trade-tokens-98bc06b269d9

Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: To everyone who have expressed their support we wish to say a huge THANK YOU! The amount of support through all channels we are receiving is overwhelming and we are really grateful for this and are having difficulty catching up with you guys. Thank you.  Having gone through most of the recent questions in this thread (last two pages) I have seen that many dear friends are asking questions already answered multiple times in this, our official announcement thread. Please scroll through the pages. You will find a LOT of useful information in regards to our project.  A major thank you must go to 'hadang' for the effort this member went through to educate all other forum members looking into our project.  To 'vopsy': We have received amazing support from professionals around the globe in regards to our project, its originality and pure intentions. We wish to thank you for being the Doubting Thomas in this thread, pushing for more details, supporting our cause. We wish to assure you that our project is 100% legit and that behind it there is a multitude of professionals already involved in forex trading, programming as well as blockchain technology with hundreds of years in combined experience. Please just Google 'trade.io' and you will be able to see if our project is legit or not. Further details will keep being disclosed in due time and based on the strategy set by trade.io as well as based on the expansion of our project as more and more organisations are joining in.  To ALL: Please expect a MAJOR announcement soon!

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: We wish to stress the fact that our platform will not limit your trading options as it will allow trading of Forex, CFDs on Stock Indices, Commodities, Stocks, Metals, Energies as well as Crypto Assets. For trading, the Trade Token will be used for maximum profit, but other types of currency will be accepted as well, crypto as well as fiat.   Quote from: Mysterious01 on November 13, 2017, 09:50:51 AM Burning of tokens is a wise idea but could you enlighten me about this phrase "percentage burned will also be matched across other allocations". I'm a little bit puzzled with this phrase.  Thank you for your query.  Based on our initial planning, 500 million Trade Tokens will be issued. From that, a specific percentage is reserved towards the liquidity pool, another towards Advisors and Vendors, and yet another towards Founders and Developers. Based on the percentage of unsold tokens, if any, an equivalent percentage of reduction will be made towards the allocated percentage of tokens reserved for Advisors and Vendors and Founders and Developers.  What does this mean in numbers - as an example:  The original number of tokens issued towards PRE-ICO and ICO is 275 million and the original number of tokens issued towards Founders and Developers is 100 million. If 247.5 million are finally sold (with 10% left unsold) it means that the same reduction of 10% will be made on the total allocated number of tokens reserved towards Founders and Developers, thus they will keep 90 million instead of the original planned 100 million (100 million - 10% = 90 million). The number of Trade Tokens originally allocated towards the liquidity pool won't be affected by the outcome of the token sale (it will stay at 50 million).  Please visit our website to see the numbers by clicking HERE. Hope this helps. Thanks.   Quote from: 12trys on November 13, 2017, 10:09:53 AM Quote from: icodata.io on November 13, 2017, 07:45:12 AM Hey guys, check out icodata's in-depth Trade.io review. We rate it 79/100, highest ever rating on our platform! https://www.icodata.io/coin/trade.io  Hi, Pre-ICO is in progress for some time, but Raised amount is 0. Why?  Exact amount of funds raised will be officially announced towards the end of PRE-ICO / begining of ICO. Thanks.   Quote from: migueltiu on November 13, 2017, 12:52:31 PM I checked out your white paper and everything was very interesting. May I know when the beta launch for this project is?  Oh and thank you for answering my question on why Ethereum is only offered.  You are welcome!  We are looking to launch beta in January/February 2018.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: To everyone who has commented in this thread and have expressed their excitement: THANK YOU! We truly believe in our project and have the expertise, backbone and will to take it to the end. We are really excited with trade.io cause it will definitely open new doors and new opportunities not just for us, but for traders and the trading industry as well. It will pave the way for - hopefully - others to follow leading in a transparent global market promoting and solidifying trust between all parties involved.      Thank you for your query. For Pre-ICO, we’ll be accepting payments via Local Bank Deposit, Ethereum & International Bank Wire. If you have Bitcoin, there are instructions in the Members Area (website: trade.io) to convert to Ethereum. For ICO, we will only be accepting payments via ETH. The reason that most companies only offer ETH during the ICO, is for automation, as during ICO many of the wallets include smart contracts, which are automatically disseminated into the clients' wallet at the time of purchase. It’s convenient for both the company doing the ICO and the customer. Feel free to check out our website's FAQ section found HERE for more details. Check points 5 to 7.

Author: S3cco
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Highly Anticipated Fintech ICO trade.io Hand Selects Senior Advisory Team Incorporating Trading, Banking & Blockchain Executives With Decades of Experience: https://bitcoingarden.org/highly-anticipated-fintech-ico-trade-io-hand-selects-senior-advisory-team...  Trade.io, a next generation financial exchange based on blockchain technology has announced high-level appointments from the blockchain and financial industries to its senior advisory teams, thereby integrating the two worlds, as an industry-first.  CEO Jim Preissler on the appointments, “We were very selective with regard to our advisory team. It’s no secret that in the ICO space, many companies stack their respective advisory teams with as many people as possible for the purpose of filling up a roster. Our advisory team, however, is filled with accomplished executives that will be actively involved. Through their participation, we know we can lean on these advisers for their guidance and experience.”  A few notable additions include:  • Michael Greenberg: The founder and CEO of Finance Magnates, the industry leader in news for electronic trading, banking and investing. • David Hannigan & Tom O’Reilly: Who together have over 60+ years experience in trading and retail foreign exchange sales and business development. • John Patrick Mullin: A Senior Buy-Side Research Analyst at Guotai Junan Securities.  Mr. Mullin focuses on fintech, blockchain, & artificial intelligence.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Hello to everyone and thank you for your support as well as for helping each other out within our community.  Yes, our platform will support major crypto as well as fiat currency.  Each member will be able to participate in the liquidity pool with a minimum of 5000 Trade Tokens as a fee frozen towards the needs of the pool. Each member will have of course the option of investing more in the pool either via Trade Token, fiat or crypto currency. This way, they'll have a higher share in the pool's earnings as well as bigger voting power come election time (on where to invest and which project to support (ICO/IPO). The idea is that each pool member will get their share of profit in whatever currency they've initialy invested in. So, if a member added for example $2000 (over the 5000 Trade Tokens) in the pool to have an extra share, they'll be receiving the earnings back in USD (plus their Trade Token share of the earnings). The same principle applies of course if a member invested Bitcoin instead of USD or both, and so on...  Of course, the project will expand as time progresses and new or different features might be added based on the market's needs...  Quote from: kable78 on November 10, 2017, 07:51:48 PM cтpaнный лoгoтип.  Thank you for your comment in regards to our logo!  It would be greatly appreciated if everyone could please keep their comments in English in this thread. This is a general rule for every forum member to stick to the language of the thread.  Our announcement thread is being translated as we speak and links to the other languages will be provided very soon.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you rangnatht. Message noted and private message sent.   Quote from: zedkiel08 on November 11, 2017, 05:04:10 AM There is a slight that i did not get in this one , can someone explain it , thanks in advance .  "At end of the ICO, all unsold Trade Tokens will be burned. Additionally, the percentage burned will also be matched across other allocations with the exception of the liquidity pool."  Thank you for your query.  Based on our initial planning, 500 million Trade Tokens will be issued. From that, a specific percentage is reserved towards the liquidity pool, another towards Advisors and Vendors, and yet another towards Founders and Developers. Based on the percentage of unsold tokens, if any, an equivalent percentage of reduction will be made towards the allocated percentage of tokens reserved for Advisors and Vendors and Founders and Developers.  What does this mean in numbers - as an example:  The original number of tokens issued towards PRE-ICO and ICO is 275 million and the original number of tokens issued towards Founders and Developers is 100 million. If 247.5 million are finally sold (with 10% left unsold) it means that the same reduction of 10% will be made on the total allocated number of tokens reserved towards Founders and Developers, thus they will keep 90 million instead of the original planned 100 million (100 million - 10% = 90 million). The number of Trade Tokens originally allocated towards the liquidity pool won't be affected by the outcome of the token sale (it will stay at 50 million).  Please visit our website to see the numbers by clicking HERE. Hope this helps. Thanks.

You allocate a portion of your coins to the liquidity pool for a set amount of time with hopes that this will generate profit. I have been investing in Forex and PSE now and then and apparently things have been going very well for me there.  Thank you, and waiting for your bounty program.  On top of Forex trading (obviously trade.io will offer the same functionality), trade.io offers the following:  Full transparency thanks to blockchain technology. Everyone trading on our platform will have access to real-world prices thus providing fair trading to all - something that isn't the case with traditional forex. This in itself is a huge advantage over traditional forex trading and a huge reason for someone to use our platform rather than anything else.  Additionally, for people that will be able to participate in our liquidity pool (they will need to lock a minimum of 5000 of their tokens as a participation fee), our platform will offer the unrepresented advantage of sharing 50% of its profit with its traders. Participants will be able to join for short periods of time, even for just 24 hours since the pool will be sharing its proceeds on a daily basis. This is groundbreaking in contrast with traditional investments that require your funds to be locked for a specific period of time sometimes up to a year or even more. The liquidity pool provides freedom never heard of before as well as transparency in regards to its real performance.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you for your query.  Please keep in mind that even if a platform member has in their possession 5000 Trade Tokens or even more, this by itself does not mean that they will automatically participate in the liquidity pool. Members with the funds will be able to choose whether or not they will participate in the pool and for how long. Over and above this, please find below some of our comments made earlier in regards to the general advantages of our platform:  'On top of Forex trading (obviously trade.io will offer the same functionality), trade.io offers the following:  Full transparency thanks to blockchain technology. Everyone trading on our platform will have access to real-world prices thus providing fair trading to all - something that isn't the case with traditional forex. This in itself is a huge advantage over traditional forex trading and a huge reason for someone to use our platform rather than anything else.  Additionally, for people that will be able to participate in our liquidity pool (they will need to lock a minimum of 5000 of their tokens as a participation fee), our platform will offer the unrepresented advantage of sharing 50% of its profit with its traders. Participants will be able to join for short periods of time, even for just 24 hours since the pool will be sharing its proceeds on a daily basis. This is groundbreaking in contrast with traditional investments that require your funds to be locked for a specific period of time sometimes up to a year or even more. The liquidity pool provides freedom never heard of before as well as transparency in regards to its real performance.'  &  'TradeToken holders may receive other coupon benefits such as preferred access or discounts on future products or new listings. To summarize, TradeToken’s act as:  - a lower cost medium of exchange on trade.io - a store of value that can be used to purchase goods and services - a membership key in the trade.io wallet to the liquidity pool - a coupon enabling wallet participants to receive higher levels of benefits - a coupon for preferred access to products or new listings on trade.io when used in the wallet'   Quote from: Sevaev on November 10, 2017, 07:35:36 AM I hope the project has a big future, good luck all the way, I am with you.  Quote from: jamilfdom on November 10, 2017, 07:40:43 AM Among the advantages of this project is obtaining the Swiss Banking license with an exchange license, and the employment of some of the biggest names in banking compliance.  Quote from: bamb on November 10, 2017, 07:40:49 AM The p2p aspect of trade.io is very good one! It is unusual to find a trading platform that is professionally built from ground up with frictionless functions also providing peer2peer in addition to the world's best platform. I really like this idea and I believe this will be hugely beneficial.  We wish to thank you all for your positive comments - we do believe we are onto something big ourselves here and have been excited about the prospects of what we are trying to do since day 1. Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: I watched the video clip on YouTube channel which made mention of users moving or gaining power from a centralized economy and venturing to Trade.io, and I urged to ask is trade.io not also a centralized exchange even though it is hoped to share profits pools with its early adopters?

Author: johnsm79
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Not everything can be decentralized. The transactions are on the blockchain, are decentralized to ensure the security and the transparency. At the same time the adopters are centralized organisations that wish to enter a transparent market and ensure that their customers can be provided with transparency, especially on the issue of who is protecting their investment, as  financial organisations tend to hide their liquidity status.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Hello jagdeepjd and sorry for our late reply.  We have indeed made our code public. Please click HERE to see the relevant information on GitHub.  Quote from: Mandy7575 on November 09, 2017, 06:20:39 PM Hi just curious to know how are the funds held ? are they stored in offline or cold wallet? or the funds are held in smart contract ?  Hello Mandy7575 and thanks for your query.  Fiat currency received is saved in a Swiss bank account, with the Ether received being kept in an Ethereum wallet. Both bank account as well as wallet details are available for public view whilst opening an account with us. Once we enter the ICO period, funds will be held in a smart contract with its details as well being published.  trade.io wishes to keep full transparency at all times.  Quote from: DARKANGEL6415 on November 10, 2017, 09:10:30 AM Quote from: levyashin on November 10, 2017, 08:01:40 AM What is the current status of funding?  There is no info on the website about the raised amount. So can you inform us, please? I actually just spent last 15 minutes reading site myself trying to find this information but i seen nothing as well  Thank you for bringing this up as well as for your consideration - you are right in regards to not finding this piece of information on our website. Please keep in mind that we are still in the PRE-ICO period where most organisations don't provide the amount of the raised funds for obvious reasons. The program is for us to publicly announce this piece of information in a press release soon.

Author: Text
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Why would you only accept Ethereum during the ICO but you are allowing now in pre-ICO to purchase TIO using fiat and other crypto-currency? What if an investor would like to buy again trade tokens or other interested people who missed the pre-ICO and they prefer to use fiat and altcoins to participate in ICO because they out of funds of ETH?

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you for your query. Can you please elaborate, explain clearly what you mean so that we may reply back in the most helpful manner?  Quote from: Text on November 09, 2017, 12:23:48 PM Why would you only accept Ethereum during the ICO but you are allowing now in pre-ICO to purchase TIO using fiat and other crypto-currency? What if an investor would like to buy again trade tokens or other interested people who missed the pre-ICO and they prefer to use fiat and altcoins to participate in ICO because they out of funds of ETH?  Thank you for your query. That’s a very good question! What we can do is make exceptions for certain people with high dollar purchases, and if that includes you, then simply email us at VIP@trade.io. The reason, for your information, that most companies only offer ETH during the ICO, is for automation, as during ICO many of the wallets include smart contracts, which are automatically disseminated into the clients' wallet at the time of purchase. It’s convenient for both the company doing the ICO and the customer. Feel free to check out our website's FAQ section found HERE for more details. Check points 5 to 7.  Quote from: jacquelinecr on November 09, 2017, 11:24:42 AM Since im in trade.io announcement thread could you please tell me Is there a minimum amount that I have to own to participate in the liquidity pool payouts?  Hello and thank you for your question.  A minimum of 5000 Trade Tokens contained within your wallet will be needed to be locked as a participation fee for you to participate in the pool's earnings.

Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: TradeToken holders may receive other coupon benefits such as preferred access or discounts on future products or new listings. To summarize, TradeToken’s act as:  - a lower cost medium of exchange on trade.io - a store of value that can be used to purchase goods and services - a membership key in the trade.io wallet to the liquidity pool - a coupon enabling wallet participants to receive higher levels of benefits - a coupon for preferred access to products or new listings on trade.io when used in the wallet

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thank you both for your comments.  What sets our project apart, is: 1. Blockchain technology providing transparency and promoting trust - something never heard of within the Forex community. 2. Our Liquidity Pool that provides unrepresented access to the platform's profits, sharing 50% of it with its participating members.  Furthermore, we wish to stress the fact that our platform will not limit your trading options as it will allow trading of Forex, CFDs on Stock Indices, Commodities, Stocks, Metals, Energies as well as Crypto Assets. For trading, the Trade Token will be used for maximum profit, but other types of currency will be accepted as well, crypto as well as fiat.

Body: Have you even checked the Whitepaper of tradei.io? XRP is missing a vital organ to succeed, something that this trading platform will have, a liquidity pool.  If you have investigate both Ripple and trade.io you will notice that Ripple is looking for liquidity providers.  Check this link: https://ripple.com/files/ripple_liquidity_one_pager.pdf  Also if you investigate trade.io you will see that they will build a liquidity pool that will not only be funded by ERC20 tokens, but also by Bitcoin, Ethereum and many other coins and even FIAT currency. This pool could fund any project, bank, investment, ICO or guarantee a transaction. This is what a liquidity pool does and is one of the few ICO's that I have seen that actually accepts FIAT currency which means that they have probably already pass the problems with regulations.  So basically the people are creating their own liquidity pool that they can trade on and also earn part of the total earnings.  I would like to believe that these two coins could collaborate and yes I believe that eventually trade.io could grow really big and even compete the big boys like Ripple!!

Body: We are really excited and honored to have already gathered devoted fans such as yourself and it's only been our first day! The liquidity pool guarantees that everyone is treated equally fairly and that everyone - at the end of the day - makes a profit as everyone's interests within our platform are aligned.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Yes there is. To participate in the liquidity pool, a member will have to lock 5000 Trade Tokens towards the pool as a participation fee. This guarantees the rights of the participating member as members will not only be participating in the platform's profits (50% of it will be shared with them), but they will also be able to democratically vote whether or not to use funds found in the pool, in order to fund an ICO or IPO, thus participating in the profits as well as risks of the investment. Another benefit that the participation fee has, is that it protects the liquidity pool since both the pool's as well as participant's interests are aligned.  Quote from: b-synthestech on November 07, 2017, 02:18:21 PM where can I find more details? rather few information((( What kind of information are you looking for exactly? Right off the bat, you may visit our website by clicking HERE and see the whitepaper HERE. Thanks.

Author: trade.io
Title: 🔷trade.io🔷[ANN] [ICO]💲31,169,749 🔷Partner Civic & Bancor🔷HitBTC & OKEx
Body: Thanks for your interest and query! Please visit our relevant page within our website by clicking HERE for more information in regards to our early adopters and supporters, keeping in mind that this is just the beginning as we are receiving an overwhelming amount of interest right now!  Some numbers in regards to FXPRIMUS our first of our early adopters: - 9 years of trading experience - Transactions of well over $180 Billion annually - Over 150 trading instruments - Industry first $2.5 Million insurance policy - Over 500.000 active members trade on their platform  FXPRIMUS has already committed into adopting the trade.io platform.  Our platform will revolutionise trading since it will be the first ever fully transparent broker platform featuring much lower fees as well as offering the opportunity to traders to have a share in our profits by participating in our liquidity pool where 50% of all the platform's profits will be allocated.  'What's in it for us' you may ask! Well, in all honesty, by gaining the trader's trust, we will expand our clientele exponentially. We are also planning to acquire a Swiss Banking license and Launch trade.io Investment Bank sometime in July 2018, thus keeping all the profit that is now being funnelled into the established status quo of globalist institutions. At the same time, 50% of these otherwise lost profits will be ending up within the liquidity pool and back to the traders with everything being fully transparent.

It seems that they have finally arrived – Welcome!   I’ll be definitely joining trade.io and keep a close eye as to what they are up to because their project is set to be one of the most successful ICOs yet!  16/11/2017 Update: STOP THE PRESS! MORE GREAT NEWS ABOUT trade.io! PLEASE SEE BELOW (I am quoting here):   We are really excited to announce a major change in regards to the requirements of participation in the liquidity pool.  The response to our liquidity pool has been overwhelming! However, trade.io's management has decided to revise the minimum number of Trade Tokens required for participation based on the feedback we received from our dear community members and supporters.  Please find the exciting details below in regards to the revision made (comments taken from our updated whitepaper):  In order to participate in the liquidity pool, clients must commit a minimum of 2,500 Trade Tokens as a membership fee.  A Graduated Plan will be used when it comes to the participants’ daily share of the profit as per the table below (Trade Token participation):    As the table suggests, the higher the amount of the participation is, the higher the percentage share of the profit will be with 25,000 Trade Tokens being the minimum number of Trade Tokens locked for full / maximum profit share (Investing 25,000 Trade Tokens and above carries an additional 10% as a bonus).    Example of Liquidity Pool Participation  To illustrate a sample situation using the graduated plan in the table above, let’s take the following hypothetical situation:  Participant A has locked 2,500 TradeTokens - this means they will be eligible for 10% participation. Participant B has locked 12,500 TradeTokens eligible for 50% participation. Participant C has locked 25,000 TradeTokens eligible for 110% participation.  Now, let’s assume the 3 participants above are the only participants in the liquidity pool and $10,000 was generated in revenue on a hypothetical day:    Participant A accounts for 6.25% of the Trade Tokens found within the liquidity pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 6.25% = 2,500) or a share of $625 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 6.25%). Since they are entitled to only 10% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 10% of $625 or $62.50.  Participant B accounts for 31.25% of the Trade Tokens found within the liquidity pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 31.25% = 12,500) or a share of $3,125 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 31.25%). Since they are entitled to 50% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 50% of $3,125 or $1,562.50.  Participant C accounts for 62.50% of the total number of Trade Tokens found within the pool (40,000 Trade Tokens x 62.50% = 25,000) or a share of $6,250 out of the $10,000 generated revenue ($10,000 x 62.50%). Since they are entitled to 110% of their share, their allocation for the day would equal to 110% of $6,250 or $6,875.
